participant_1.background:
I lie to my parents about my kids' behavior.
Last year, I painted a portrait of my two small dogs.
I love Halloween because I can wear my favorite comfortable clothes and collect as many toys as I want.
I take my dog for a walk in the park before I head to work at the museum.
I am an amateur chef who cooks 5 different cuisines and my immediate family is not in the culinary arts.

participant_2.background:
I like to read diabetes blogs to learn about new ways to control my condition.
I enjoy the creative process of designing and sewing my own clothes.
My parents are proud of my photography.
I'm interested in learning about new driving techniques to improve my racing.
i have beard that is longer.

content.text: Good, thank you! I'm working on a new sewing project. What about you?
I'm doing well! I'm just about to head to work at the museum.
Oh, that's cool! I love museums. What kind of museum do you work at?
It's an art museum, and we have a lot of really cool exhibits.
That sounds awesome! I love art. What's your favorite piece of art in the museum?
I'm not sure I could pick just one favorite, but I love the Monet paintings.
Monet is my favorite artist! I love his impressionist style.
Me too! His paintings are so peaceful and relaxing.
I'm glad to meet someone else who loves Monet!
Me too! What kind of sewing project are you working on?
I'm making a new pair of pants. I've been designing them myself, and I'm really excited to see how they turn out.
That's awesome! I love sewing, but I'm not very good at it.
It's a lot of fun to learn! And there are so many resources available online these days.
I'll have to look into that. Thanks for the tip!
No problem! Have a great day at work!
